unnormalised: Campus hiring remains crucial for securing fresh talent. Our HR team at Tata Consultancy Services is planning extensive drives at IIT Delhi and IIM Ahmedabad in Q3 2024. Like in "3 Idiots", we seek candidates with both technical prowess and innovative thinking. Packages start at Rs. 12 Lakhs per annum, with relocation assistance upto 50 km. Looking forward to a successful recruitment season! We aim to hire 200+ grads.
normalised: Campus hiring remains crucial for securing fresh talent. Our H R team at Tata Consultancy Services is planning extensive drives at I I T Delhi and I I M Ahmedabad in quarter three two thousand and twenty four. Like in "three Idiots", we seek candidates with both technical prowess and innovative thinking. Packages start at rupee twelve lakhs per annum, with relocation assistance up to fifty kilometer. Looking forward to a successful recruitment season! We aim to hire two hundred plus grads.
